email_rollback.description: If you recently changed your email address in Cloudflare account settings, a reset code was sent to you. Enter the code to rollback this change.
email_rollback.title: Rollback your email change
login.email_mfa.description:
You are signing in from an unrecognized IP address.

Check for an email with the subject [Cloudflare]: Your login token. Enter the token below.
login.email_mfa.description_manual: Check for an email with the subject [Cloudflare]: Your login token and enter the token below.
login.email_mfa.title: Check your email and enter the token
login.email_mfa.cant_login: If you do not receive this email in the next 10 minutes, complete the login-help form for assistance.
login.email_mfa.resend_error: Failed to resend code. Please try again.
login.email_mfa.send_error: Failed to send code. Please try again.
login.email_mfa.not_enabled: Email authentication is not set up for your user. Try another authentication method.
login.error.beta_requirement: You must be part of the beta to log in
login.error.captcha.empty: Complete the Turnstile verification and try again
login.error.captcha.invalid: Incorrect Turnstile response. Try the verification again.
login.error.discourse_missing_params: Discourse SSO is missing some information.
login.error.email_password_mismatch: Email address and password do not match. Check for typos and try again.
login.error.form_expired: Session expired due to inactivity. Refresh the page and try again.
login.error.invalid_email: Invalid email address. Check for typos and try again.
login.error.invalid_redirect_uri: Invalid redirect uri. Please try again.
login.error.no.invite.found: Your organization requires an invitation for login.
login.error.no.user.found: We could not find that email. Check for typos or try a different email.
login.error.sso_does_not_exist: Single sign-on (SSO) configuration not found. Try a different login method.
login.error.unexpected: We could not log you in. Try again or contact support.
login.error.user_disabled: Access to your user is blocked due to suspected malicious use of Cloudflare services. Regain access at dash.cloudflare.com/login-help.
login.error.two_factor.cookie_expired: The authentication request expired. Try logging in again.
login.error.two_factor.invalid_email_tok: The provided authentication code does not match.
That email does not match your two-factor authentication token. Try another email.
login.error.two_factor.invalid_password: The password provided is incorrect, try again.
login.error.two_factor.invalid_token: Incorrect authentication code. Use the exact code provided by your authenticator application.
login.error.two_factor.invalid_security_: That security key is not registered with this account. Try another security key.
login.error.two_factor.invalid_user: We could not find that email. Check for typos or try a different email.
login.error.two_factor.maxed_out_attempt: Too many failed attempts. Try again later.
login.error.two_factor.mismatch: That email does not match your two-factor authentication setup. Try another email.
login.error.two_factor.timed_out: That authentication code is expired. Request a new code and try again.
login.lc-pw.warning.title: Leaked Password Detected
login.lc-pw.warning.description:
Cloudflare has detected that you are using a password that has been leaked based on data breach information. To reduce the risk of your account being compromised, we are requiring a password reset of your Cloudflare account. Cloudflare is not displaying this notice because we have lost control of your credentials.

You have %{count} more login attempts before we will lock your account until you reset your password.

Please go to the authentication page to reset your password. We encourage you to also enable two-factor authentication for your account. You can find additional info about this process on our developer docs.
login.lc-pw-reset.error.pw-reset-initiat: Your password may have been leaked in a third-party data breach. Reset your password by following the instructions sent to your email.
login.lc-pw-reset.error: Please reset your password. Refer to the email sent to your account or the documentation for more information.
login.federal_warning: You are accessing a FedRAMP Authorized system. All system usage may be monitored, recorded, and audited. Unauthorized use of the system is prohibited and subject to criminal and civil penalties. You consent to all monitoring and recording activities.
login.help_center.title: Log in to Cloudflare Help Center
login.info.manage_account_invite: You are invited to manage %{account}'s account.
login.let_us_know_youre_human: Let us know you are human
login.title: Log in to Cloudflare
login.help_center.confirmation.text: Would you like to be redirected to the help center hosted by Salesforce to view support activities?
login.help_center.in_progress.title: Redirecting to Cloudflare help center hosted by Salesforce...

login.two_factor.description_with_email: Enter an authenticator app code or a recovery code:
login.two_factor.backup_description: Keep your recovery codes in a safe location. If you don't have recovery codes yet, you will receive them sometime within the next few weeks.
login.two_factor.enable_description.md: One of your accounts requires you to set up two-factor authentication:
login.two_factor.setup_invite: **%{account}** requires you to set up two-factor before you can join:
login.two_factor.switch_to_totp: Use authenticator app or recovery code instead
login.two_factor.title: Two-Factor Authentication
login.verify_email: Verify the email address of your account by logging in.
login.change_email: If you are changing your email address, log in using your EXISTING email address.
reset_password.confirmation: Your new password has been set. Welcome back!
reset_password.description: Copy the reset code from your email and paste it below.
reset_password.title: Reset your password
reset_password.error.compromised_passwor: That password was leaked in a third-party data breach. Choose a different password.
password.compromised.error: That password was leaked in a third-party data breach. Choose a different password.
